item.title: Report E-2024120221
item.description:
Report E-2024120221

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-11
  • City: OKLAHOMA CITY
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 11:40 EST, ERTS was contacted by XPO Logistics (LOO) about a cargo release. It was reported that due to an unknown puncture, approximately 10 ounces of V706-D Printing Ink (hazardous - UN1210) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the box and did not impact the dock floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS. The released product, and damaged bottle was placed into a 20-gallon poly drum and staged for terminal personnel to manage.
